name: Grapple, a platformer!
description:
Game Trailer:

 
 Grapple 2.2 Trailer - YouTube

Big Thanks to @Griffpatch for the tutorial on the Movement coding And @Scratchmaker2321 for Hurt Box script.

Grapple was made because I found a bug with the hitbox... I learned that I could hook to platforms, Griffpatch mentioned in his platformer tutorial... about the hit boxes of the scratch cat hit box would mess up the collision of corners, so he made his own hit box... I was Curious and decided to use it to my advantage...
